parameters.name: EventContent
parameters.description:
The content of the system event.

>  The value of this parameter is a JSON object. We recommend that you include the `product`, `resourceId`, and `regionId` fields in the JSON object.

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description:
The name of the system event.

>  For more information, see [DescribeSystemEventMetaList](~~114972~~).

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: Product
parameters.description:
The name of the cloud service.

>  For information about the Alibaba Cloud services that are supported by CloudMonitor, see [Supported cloud services and their system events](~~167388~~).
